About

Hey, this is Silhouette.
书要好好读，喜欢的也要好好争取。
大家好，我是Silhouette，一枚Java开发工程师萌新，爱阅读、爱做饭，也爱接触新技术。作为一名刚入行不久的程序猿，正在不断的学习和积累，努力的向着理想而奋斗！
Read well,and strive well for those wuh like it.
Hello everyone, I am Silhouette, a Java development engineer who is cute, loves reading, cooking, and new technology. As a programmer who has just entered the industry, he is constantly learning and accumulating, striving towards the ideal!
